name: GamePoint CardParty
description:
Play this cardgame with people from all over the world. Join your friends or make new ones.

Your Goal
->Finish first, by playing all hidden cards from your personal stock pile.
->Form series, discard wisely, keep ahead of your opponents and you might come out on top!
Luck, strategy and timing are your keys to success.

Features
->Play and have fun with people all over the world.
->Easy to learn, hard to master!
->Real time matches
->Seamless Cross-platform experience
->Chat, connect and find friends
->Start a game with custom rules
->Gain higher combo’s and unlock achievements!
->Win a round and gain coins, experience, achievements and new friends

This game is intended for an adult audience.
This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
